attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: bring back british Rail stop this stupid way the trains are now run and the Cost, DONT forget even though they are privetised 'WE' the tax payer still pour money into the railway.Lets stop this nonsence Now!, GET RID OF PRIVETISATION.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
